item.title: Some problems with the model US policymakers are using to forecast coronavirus outbreak
item.description: A letter published in the Annals of Internal Medicine urges caution for policy makers relying on IHME’s model. The TL;DR is captured by a statistician Yet another important reminder, it doesn't get clearer than this: "The IHME projections are based not on transmission dynamics but on a statistical model with no epidemiologic basis."
